about:
I am a passionate Frontend Developer with 4+ years of experience delivering responsive, scalable, and user-friendly web applications. My expertise lies in React.js, Tailwind CSS, and modern UI libraries, where I specialize in building clean, maintainable, and high-performing interfaces.
 Currently, I am expanding my skill set into the MERN stack to grow as a full-stack developer and strengthen my ability to contribute across the entire development lifecycle. I thrive in collaborative environments, enjoy solving complex problems, and take pride in writing efficient, production-ready code.
 Beyond coding, I am deeply interested in exploring emerging technologies, refining UI/UX design practices, and contributing to projects that create meaningful digital experiences. My goal is to continuously evolve as a developer while delivering solutions that add measurable value to businesses and users alike.
